en.codex: The Glaive Prime is a deadly and beautiful weapon from the Orokin era. The blades are as effective in close quarters as they are when thrown at distant enemies.
en.description: The Glaive Prime is a Primed version of the Glaive. The Glaive Prime was added into the game in Update 11.0. If thrown, this weapon will bounce five times before returning to its owner or after reaching 30m away from its owner.

ru.description: Глефа Прайм - смертельное и красивое оружие Эпохи Орокин. Её лезвия являются эффективными в тесном помещении, когда они выпущены в направлении врагов.
